header.title: AI Chat Assistant
header.subtitle: Intelligent conversations with multiple AI providers
header.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start chatting

input.placeholder: Type your message... (Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
input.pressEnter: Press {{enter}} to send, {{shiftEnter}} for new line

messages.emptyDescription: Start a new conversation with AI or select an existing chat from the sidebar. You can chat with multiple AI providers and models.

settings.title: Chat Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure AI behavior and model parameters
settings.resetDescription: Reset all settings to provider defaults

model.title: AI Provider & Model
model.description: Choose the AI provider and specific model for this conversation

parameters.title: Generation Parameters
parameters.description: Fine-tune how the AI generates responses
parameters.temperatureDesc: Controls randomness. Higher values make output more random, lower values more focused.
parameters.maxTokensDesc: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.
parameters.topPDesc: Controls nucleus sampling. Lower values focus on more likely tokens.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.frequencyPenaltyDesc: Reduces repetition of tokens based on frequency.
advanced.presencePenaltyDesc: Reduces repetition of tokens based on presence.
advanced.systemPromptDesc: Instructions that define the AI's behavior and personality.
advanced.contextLengthDesc: Maximum context window for conversation history.

error.openai: Failed to get response from OpenAI
error.anthropic: Failed to get response from Anthropic
error.google: Failed to get response from Google
error.local: Failed to get response from local model

providers.mockResponse: This is a simulated AI response for demo purposes.

upload.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
upload.info: These files will be attached to your message and processed by the AI.
upload.errorTooLarge: File "{{fileName}}" is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}.
upload.errorMaxFiles: Cannot upload more than {{max}} files at once.

error.loadMessages: Failed to load messages. Please try again.
error.sendMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
error.createChat: Failed to create new chat. Please try again.
error.deleteChat: Failed to delete chat. Please try again.
error.updateSettings: Failed to update chat settings. Please try again.

validation.maxTokens: Max tokens must be between 1 and 8192
validation.topP: Top P must be between 0 and 1
